en.title: About us
en.subtitle: We are a group of dedicated, passionate and ambitious individuals aiming to contribute positively to the preservation of the EOS platform and its community.

cn.title: 关于我们
cn.subtitle: 我们的团队敬业、充满激情且怀有雄心壮志。团队一直致力于发展、维护EOS平台和EOS社区，为之做出积极贡献。

pillars.title: Why vote for us?
pillars.description0: We're dedicated to fostering the EOS platform through reliable and efficient block production and community engagement.
pillars.description1: An EOS Nation Ambassador is an individual that is passionate about EOS projects and wants to play a part in that ecosystem.
pillars.description2: If EOS Nation is "elected" as Block Producer, two Elastic Compute Cloud (EC2) instances will be running as full EOS nodes.

carousel.description0: To explore and help the eccosystem grow, tools need be developed.  EOS Nation helps users with the need tools
carousel.description1: To explore and help the eccosystem grow, tools need be developed.  EOS Nation helps users with the need tools.
carousel.description2: EOS Nation is an active BP in the EOS community that helps forward the best initiatives in the ecosystem

pillars.title: 为什么给我们投票？
pillars.description0: 我们致力于通过可靠、高效的块产出和社区承诺，来发展维护EOS平台。
pillars.description1: EOS Nation 大使是对EOS项目充满热情的个体，通过举办或参与促进EOS生态系统的活动，参与到生态系统中，做出贡献。
pillars.description2: 如果EOSNation被选择成为节点，2个弹性计算云 Elastic Compute Cloud(EC2)实例将作为完备节点运行。

carousel.description0: 我们致力于通过可靠、高效的块产出和社区承诺，来发展维护EOS平台。
carousel.description1: 如果EOSNation被选择成为节点，2个弹性计算云 Elastic Compute Cloud(EC2)实例将作为完备节点运行。
carousel.description2: EOSNation是EOS社区中非常活跃的节点，致力于帮助推进发展生态建设的积极性方案。
